text: En route to H-4 then Soft Count.

And check in with triage before you leave.

Asked a bunch of students to watch a basketball game-- count the number of times the ball was passed.

Afterwards, the professor asked his students if they noticed the gorilla.
If I see a gorilla, I'll arrest it.

he was shot in the back by one of his own partners?

you should be reading Car & Driver instead of Sand and Surf.
Someone put the wrong type of fluid in the car's transmission.
See, Ford automobiles use a thick, red, Type F transmission fluid.
General Motors uses a thinner, yellow fluid with Dexron.
Now, when Dexron's put into a Ford it thins that Type F fluid.
The second gear is usually the first to go.
Friction causes the engine to overheat, in turn cooking the transmission fluid turning it brown.
Leak on the pavement is the first clue you've got a problem.
Congratulations-- you're looking for a Ford with a leak.
The getaway vehicle has a stubborn second gear.
Which means it can't get very far.
My guess is it's already been dumped.

but the money was gone Darin was dead, and I panicked.
